18.title: The New Edition Story: Cast and Creators in Conversation at PALEYLIVE LA 2016
18.plot: Cast and creators of BET's "The New Edition Story" gather for a celebration of their show at PALEYLIVE LA 2016.

19.title: Tony Bennett Celebrates 90 at PALEYLIVE NY 2016
19.plot: Tony Bennett celebrates his career at PALEYLIVE NY 2016. Topics discussed include: his new concert special as "the biggest thing" he's ever done; receiving his stage name from Bob Hope; and why he will never tire of performing "the songs that never die."

20.title: 24: Legacy: Cast and Creators in Conversation at PALEYLIVE NY 2016
20.plot: Cast and creators of FOX's "24: Legacy" gather for a celebration of their show at PALEYLIVE NY 2016.

imdb.plot outline: Throughout the year, The Paley Center for Media presents revealing interviews and behind-the-scenes discussions with the cast and creators of hit television shows in front of live theater audiences at the Paley Center in New York and Los Angeles.
imdb.title: Paleylive
plot: Throughout the year, The Paley Center for Media presents revealing interviews and behind-the-scenes discussions with the cast and creators of hit television shows in front of live theater audiences at the Paley Center in New York and Los Angeles.
